ContentDesc_Das Meso-System:
The lights of Living Memory no longer shine, and the Meso Terminal at its center stands silent amidst the wistful echoes of lives once lived. A monument to the existence of the Alexandrian people, as well as a resting place for their memories, it is within this soaring spire that Calyx maintains his stronghold.

The self-proclaimed architect of mankind's evolution has invited you to confront him in the upper reaches of the terminalâ”€an invitation you must accept lest his atrocities continue to escalate. Step into the structure's glowing interior, and begin your wary ascent through the midst of the dreaming Endless...
